page.title: 14DAY OF A PARENT (CONT.)
page.content: Sometimes he has to work seasonal overtime until 8 or 9p.m. After the family have their main meal the daughters do their homework and practise musical instruments - violin and 'cello. In the evening mother does some ironing then goes to swimming classes in St Andrews. Father takes the dog for his evening walk. Television is often watched for the rest of the evening. {Favourite Meal} Soup Chicken Soup with Rice Main Course Roast Chicken, Roast Potatoes, Stuffing, Brussel Sprouts, Sweetcorn Sweet Lemon Meringue Pie, Fresh Cream.
